recipe_name: Barbecue sweetcorn with smoked chilli garlic butter
author: Paul Rankin
programme: Chefs: Put Your Menu Where Your Mouth Is
method: Preheat the barbecue to hot. Barbecue the corn until cooked through. For the smoked chilli garlic butter, place all the ingredients in a food processor and blend for 30 seconds, or until the mixture is shiny and smooth.   Turn into a bowl and reserve. To serve, top the corn with a spoonful of the soft butter, and serve immediately.
ingredients: 12 sweetcorn cobs,  225g/8oz unsalted butter, at room temperature,  2 tbsp lemon juice,  2 tbsp chopped fresh herbs, such as coriander or parsley,  2 anchovies, finely chopped,  1 tbsp chopped shallot,  4 tbsp smoked barbecue sauce (or smoked ketchup ),  2 sliced smoked chipotle chillies, or fresh chillies ,  ½ tsp salt,  ¼ tsp ground white pepper
